actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income gain on the sale or exchange of certain farmland if the owners of the farmland, in a convenant binding themselves and all future owners of their land, restrict the use of such land to use as farmland.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income gain from the sale or exchange of certain farmland if the use of such land is restricted to farming by a covenant binding all future owners of such land.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income gain on the sale or exchange of certain farmland if the owners of the farmland, in a convenant binding themselves and all future owners of their land, restrict the use of such land to use as farmland.
